attributes.action: Call for a vote of no confidence in the Labour government
attributes.additional_details: The Labour government have failed the citizens of the United Kingdom on immigration, have failed to aid economic growth and stability, have no control on spending, have wasted and committed our money on net zero and have failed on security and policing.
attributes.background: Call for an immediate general election

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
